property.name: Damage
property.summary: Gets or sets the damage caused by this Ammo.

property.name: Description
property.summary: Gets or sets the description of this Ammo.

property.name: EditorId
property.summary: Gets or sets the Editor ID associated with this form.

property.name: FormId
property.summary: Gets the Form ID associated with this form.

property.name: FullName
property.summary: Gets or sets the in-game name of this Ammo.

property.name: IgnoresNormalWeaponResistance
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Ammo ignores normal weapon damage resistance.

property.name: InventoryImage
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the inventory image (.dds file) that will be used for this Ammo.

property.name: IsBolt
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Ammo is a bolt.

property.name: IsPlayable
property.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether this Ammo can be used by the player character.

property.name: Keywords
property.summary: Gets or sets the containing Keywords associated with this Ammo.

property.name: MessageIcon
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the message icon (.dds file) that will be used for this Ammo.

property.name: ObjectBounds
property.summary: Gets or sets the of this Ammo.

property.name: PickUpSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Ammo is picked up.

property.name: Projectile
property.summary: Gets or sets the Projectile that is launched when this Ammo is used.

property.name: PutDownSound
property.summary: Gets or sets the Sound that plays when this Ammo is put down.

property.name: ShortName
property.summary: Gets or sets the short name of this Ammo.

property.name: Value
property.summary: Gets or sets the value of this Ammo.

property.name: WorldModel
property.summary: Gets or sets the path to the world model (.nif file) that will be used for this Ammo.

method.name: HasTag
method.summary: Determines whether this form has been tagged with the specified text.

method.name: Tag
method.summary: Tags this form with the specified text.
